overview: One of Latin music's superstars, Pepe Aguilar delivers a Grammy-winning concert performance from the Gibson Amphitheatre in Los Angeles. Combining traditional Mexican sounds with contemporary pop and backed by both mariachis and a rock band, Aguilar creates a sound all his own. Songs include "El Toro Serrano," "Por una Mujer Bonita" and "El Gustito."
title: Pepe Aguilar: Live En Vivo
